title: [Ta'Illistim, Aaendarein Var]
description: The var winds to its end beneath a tall stone outcropping.  Nestled beneath the shelter of the rocky cliff face, a small shop boasts a welcoming sign swinging from a post beside the doorstep.  Small beds planted with brightly colored perennials reflect a bit of the shimmering moonlight on their dew-soaked petals.

The var winds to its end beneath a tall stone outcropping.  Nestled beneath the shelter of the rocky cliff face, a small shop boasts a welcoming sign swinging from a post beside the doorstep.  Small beds planted with brightly colored perennials bring a bit of gaiety to an otherwise rocky area.

The var winds to its end beneath a tall stone outcropping.  Nestled beneath the shelter of the rocky cliff face, a small shop boasts a hung banner suspended to rest beside the doorstep.  The ground around the building is thick with moss and heavy boulders.
